name: Mirare Shattered Self
description:
In a land across the looking glass, Celia finds herself trapped in a strange land.  In this HD-2D adventure, travel across a wondrously dangerous land as you search for a way back to reality from the world that reflects fiction.

Strategically fight through battles, solve puzzles, and discover the meaning of the power that you’ve been given. What lies beyond the mirror’s mirage?
